stories.title: LTE downlink: reference signals and transmit diversity

stories.text:
Is there anything going on specific to Raspberry Pi or is it just supply chain or chip shortage issues causing the supply and price issues?

I'm seeing prices over $150 when I can find one in the US. It's cheaper to get a refurbished desktop with decent specs. It just takes up more room and uses more electricity. Just wondering when the prices might get closer to normal again.
stories.title: Ask HN: Raspberry Pi Prices and Availability

stories.text:
Hello my shape changed a lot since i was a kid,and thats totally normal,but some changes are so extreme that they concern me, my hair became much worse,and i mean MUCH worse,it isnt as black,smooth,silky,shiny or thick as it used to,my nose also became taller(downwards),thinner,thinner from top and thicker from bottom,my nose holes are both tighter and a big meat wiggly ball formed at the tip, my lips became rounder and smaller,and a white border appeared at the top and right bottom,my eyes are lazier and my eyebrows are rounder,my eye also seems smaller for a some reason, my face is longer,thinner at the middle and thicker where the forehead and cheeks are.the back of my head also became really weird,its tall and elongated sorta,my head looks like some sort of pear fruit,my two side profiles are absolutely disgusting.

My body is so tall and thin,my spine is leaning inwards at the middle, but leans outward at the top,its just weird,i wish i could put images here. What is the reason this happened?and can some of these problems be fixed?please help cause im so desperate right now.
stories.title: My Shape Changed Drastically
